moves.1. Nf3: Hi! i needed to win this game to win the mini tournament. another 1800 had 5.5 score and i had 5.0 score, this was also the last game in the mini tournament so i really needed a win!!
moves.7. Nxc6: ? this just losses a pawn. a bad start.
moves.7... Qxc6: attacking my h1 rook and attacking the c4 pawn. cant defend both at the same time.
moves.8. f3 Qxc4 9. e4 Qc7 10. Be3 Bb4 11. Rc1: so far im filling depressed. i know im going to loss.
moves.14... Bxc3 15. Rxc3 b6 16. Re1 Ba6 17. f: if i want to win the game, i must attack!!
moves.21... Rc8 22. Rxc8+ Bxc8 23. e5: ! threatening g4 trapping the black knight.
moves.25. a5 bxa5 26. b5: ! i think that this the only way i can go for a win!! my two bishops control the hole board!!
moves.26... Ne8 27. Bxa7 Nc7: i dare not advance the b pawn, black will queen.
moves.29... a4 30. Bc4 Bb7 31. Bxd5 Bxd5: now its a opposite colored bishop end game. its surly a draw??
moves.32. Bc5: ! the best move!! this cuts the king from getting to the b5 pawn.
moves.33... Kh6: ? not sure why black played this.
moves.34. h3: planning a trap! do you see it??????
moves.36. g4+ Kh4 37. Kh2: ! keeping the black king out of g3. now i threaten mate.
moves.37... g5 38. Be7 h6: forced, if not, i will mate black. (even though i will still mat him!!)
moves.39. fxg5 hxg5 40. Bc5:
resigns!!! there is no defense too Bf2 mate! hoped the you liked it?? please comment and rate it o the star system. thanks!!
